A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I felt that this was one of the best well-written Starwars movies out there. If you're an old-timer and are stuck on the original trilogy this movie is not for you but if you're somebody who's looking to expand the Star Wars Universe in a way that's logical this is the movie. I love the fact that it did not take itself too seriously and the humor was quite appropriate not like Jar Jar Binks. I will definitely be seeing this movie again in the theater shortly.
